Ratings.comment: Figg is fine. Three quizzes and a final, with five discussion posts makes up your grade. The grade for the discussions can also be substituted for your lowest quiz grade. Quiz/exams are fair. Just study the review guides she posts on Carmen. Class is mandatory, with participation also built into the grade. Overall, a fine professor.

There's 4 exams that are all 30 point multiple choice questions. The exams are relatively difficult and you have to pay really close attention to the readings in order to answer all of them. There aren't many questions so if you miss a few your grade won't be great.

SEI.Subject: MEDREN
SEI.Class Name: Magic and Witchcraft in the Middle Ages and Renaissance

Ratings.comment: He is possible the best professor at OSU. His lectures are extremly clear.
